doCards.action: Stand up and then sit down.
Give a compliment to the player on your right.
Imitate a famous celebrity for 30 seconds.
Dance without music for one minute.
Tell a funny joke to the group.

drinkCards.action: Take one sip of your drink.
Take two sips of your drink.
Exchange drinks with the player to your left.
Choose someone to take a shot.

devilCardsModifier1.action: Give up your turn to the player of your choice.
No talking until your next turn.
Play the rest of the game standing up.

devilCardsModifier2.action: Start a group wave around the table.

devilCardsModifier3.action: Text a random contact a funny meme.
Post a silly selfie on social media.
Call a friend and sing 'Happy Birthday'.
Do an impression of a cartoon character.
Make up a short rap about the game.
